fer.ai

Class AiTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • fer.ai.AiTask

  • public class AiTask
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Evan Stewart A struct class that stores the parameters surrounding a potential action for and AI player to take, the the unit to which it is assigned, and its priority, which is evaluated based on its type.

      • AiTask

        public AiTask(int mapx,
              int mapy)
        Creates a new AITask of type AITask.TaskType.GO_TO_TILE
        Parameters:
        mapx - The x-coordinate of the destination tile
        mapy - The y-coordinate of the destination tile

      • AiTask

        public AiTask(int targetIndex)
        Creates a new AITask of type AITask.TaskType.ATTACK_UNIT
        Parameters:
        targetIndex - The index on the current map of the target unit
